snippet.title: Arcade Longplay [213] Badlands
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Georgc3

Don't know why I did this as I'm usually not into Western games. Played on Daphne Emulator.

A Western/Gun shooting game where you play a character named Buck, whose wife and children were killed by a group of bad guys. Revenge is the only thing on your mind. You head for town, equipped only with your gun, searching for the people who ruined your life.

This is Konami's only arcade game that uses a laserdisc. It uses full length animation  rather than computer graphics. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
